invert.label: Invert
invert.description: What's the opposite? What if this weren't true?
invert.placeholder: Explore the inverse or negation of this concept...

connect.placeholder: Link this to another concept, field, or experience...

process.label: Process

process.placeholder: Break down the process or explain how it works...

analogy.label: Analogy
analogy.description: What is this like? Create a comparison.

critique.label: Critique
critique.description: What are the limitations or weaknesses?
critique.placeholder: Consider edge cases, exceptions, or counterarguments...

apply.label: Apply

apply.placeholder: Describe a real-world application or example...

select-note-type.label: Card Type
select-note-type.tooltip: Choose the type of card you want to create

about.description: This program was made by a student from Germany studying medicine. Skola is in early development. You may encounter bugs. If you do, I'd be very pleased if you reported them on the git repository.
about.title: About

appearance.color-scheme-description: Choose between always light or dark theme or use the color theme of your system.
appearance.density-description: Choose between relaxed spacing or compact spacing. Auto uses compact on desktop and relaxed on touch devices.
appearance.title: Appearance

developer.description: This is the developer tab. It will contain extra settings for developers.
developer.title: Developer

editing.markdown-hint: You can also use keyboard shortcuts and basic markdown syntax to format text.
editing.show-options-for-subscript-and-superscri: Show options for subscript and superscript
editing.title: Editing
editing.use-toolbar-description: Always show a toolbar with formatting options above the editor

settings.editing-use-bubble-menu-description: Only show formatting options when text is selected

general.enable-developer-mode-description: This will enable additional options for debugging and creating custom plugins and themes.
general.enable-zen-mode-description: Zen Mode automatically activates full screen mode during learning sessions.
general.language-description: Set the language for the user interface.
general.name: Name
general.name-description: This name will be used to customize the user experience.
general.show-shortcut-hints-description: Possible keyboard shortcuts will appear in menus etc.
general.title: General

learn.enable-visual-feedback-description: Show a short color flash after answering a card depending on your rating.
learn.enableHardAndEasyDescription: Show the Hard and Easy rating buttons during learning. When disabled, only Again and Good are available.
learn.show-cognitive-prompts-description: Display thinking prompts after mastered cards to encourage deeper engagement with the material.
learn.maximumIntervalDescription: The maximum interval in days between two repetitions of a card
learn.newToReviewRatioDescription: This determines how many new cards will be new cards will be shown per review on average. A value of 0.5 means that reviews and new cards will be ordered in equal amounts.
learn.requestRetentionDescription: Set which percentage of questions you want to be able to remember in the long-term. Note: High values will lead to more reviews and shorter intervals. Lower percentages will generally reduce the amount of learning. If requested retention is too low, you will forget your cards too often which may result in an increased learning demand. Recommended values lie between 0.70 and 0.95.
learn.title: Learning

settings.title: Settings

not-found.title: Not Found
not-found.message: We couldn't find what you are look for. Please try again.
